Articles.Content: Oh my! Even my washing machine is revving it! Event inanimate objects are getting hyped! Hype train forward!

> 
> Sorry dude, trying to keep this thread under a modicum of control. Sooo any text walls to deal with. :/

Tried to help by yelling at people to chill with the walls of text.

Yeah yeah I know, backseat moderating, but at the speeds of the hypetrain, you take what help you can get I guess.
We need 502 pages of HYPE to appease the Error 502 gods!

> 
> HERE WE GO!! [http://i.imgur.com/gjDjtvc.gif](http://i.imgur.com/gjDjtvc.gif) KEEP IT UP LADS!

POWAH!

Onwards! To 500!

The hype is killing me

GIVE HER ALL ITS GOT, LADIES AND GENTS!

> HYPEHYPEHYOPEHYPEHYPOEHYOEOUHI

Thats just time lagÃ¢â‚¬Â¦we have long past it

> It will kill us all.

The HYPE is out there. It can't be reasoned with. It doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And it absolutely will not stop, ever, until KSP 1.0 is released.

We should do a countdown, surely the gods will favour us and release it when we reach 0.

50!
